original_title: True Colors: LGBTQ+ Our Stories, Our Songs
overview: A TV special that celebrates the stories and music that make us who we are. Offering a unique look at the history of the LGBTQ+ community in the United States, the special shares real-life stories of hope, resilience and triumph from people across the country, artistically represented through thematically relevant music. Exploring the personal journeys of remarkable individuals, the program connects these heartfelt stories with the history of the LGBTQ+ movement.
title: True Colors: LGBTQ+ Our Stories, Our Songs
